Date date1 = new Date(5000);
System.out.println("\u4ECE1970\u5E741\u67081\u65E5 \u65E9\u4E0A8\u70B90\u52060\u79D2 \u5F00\u59CB\u7ECF\u5386\u4E865\u79D2\u7684\u65F6\u95F4:"+date1);

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`SimpleDateFormat sdf =new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss" );
String str = "2016/1/5 12:12:12";

try {
    Date d = sdf.parse(str);
    System.out.printf("\u5B57\u7B26\u4E32 %s \u901A\u8FC7\u683C\u5F0F  yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss %n\u8F6C\u6362\u4E3A\u65E5\u671F\u5BF9\u8C61: %s",str,d.toString());
    //\u5B57\u7B26\u4E32 2016/1/5 12:12:12 \u901A\u8FC7\u683C\u5F0F  yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss 	
    //\u8F6C\u6362\u4E3A\u65E5\u671F\u5BF9\u8C61: Tue Jan 05 12:12:12 CST 2016
} catch (ParseException e) {
    // TODO Auto-generated catch block
    e.printStackTrace();
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("yyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
Date now = new Date();

//\u91C7\u7528\u5355\u4F8B\u6A21\u5F0F\u83B7\u53D6\u65E5\u5386\u5BF9\u8C61Calendar.getInstance();
Calendar c = Calendar.getInstance();
//\u901A\u8FC7\u65E5\u5386\u5BF9\u8C61\u5F97\u5230\u65E5\u671F\u5BF9\u8C61
Date d = c.getTime();

//\u5F53\u524D\u65F6\u95F4
c.setTime(now); //\u628A\u8FD9\u4E2A\u65E5\u5386\uFF0C\u8C03\u6210\u5F53\u524D\u65E5\u671F
System.out.println("\u5F53\u524D\u65E5\u671F\uFF1A"+sdf.format(c.getTime()));

// \u4E0B\u4E2A\u6708\u7684\u4ECA\u5929
c.setTime(now);
c.add(Calendar.MONTH, 1);
System.out.println("\u4E0B\u4E2A\u6708\u7684\u4ECA\u5929:\\t" +sdf.format(c.getTime()));

// \u53BB\u5E74\u7684\u4ECA\u5929
c.setTime(now);
c.add(Calendar.YEAR, -1);
System.out.println("\u53BB\u5E74\u7684\u4ECA\u5929:\\t" +sdf.format(c.getTime()));

// \u4E0A\u4E2A\u6708\u7684\u7B2C\u4E09\u5929
c.setTime(now);
c.add(Calendar.MONTH, -1);
c.set(Calendar.DATE, 3);
System.out.println("\u4E0A\u4E2A\u6708\u7684\u7B2C\u4E09\u5929:\\t" +sdf.format(c.getTime()));

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.h3,{id:"\u63A8\u5BFC\u8FC7\u7A0B",children:[(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.a,{className:"header-anchor",href:"#\u63A8\u5BFC\u8FC7\u7A0B",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.span,{className:"icon icon-link"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/heavenmei/Desktop/heavenmei.io/content/note/Java/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-9ed1a431-d8e7-439e-8ad0-8d70f74b854b.mdx"},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/heavenmei/Desktop/heavenmei.io/content/note/Java/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-9ed1a431-d8e7-439e-8ad0-8d70f74b854b.mdx"},this),"\u63A8\u5BFC\u8FC7\u7A0B"]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"/Users/heavenmei/Desktop/heavenmei.io/content/note/Java/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-9ed1a431-d8e7-439e-8ad0-8d70f74b854b.mdx",lineNumber:154,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`/*
\u63A8\u5BFClambda\u8868\u8FBE\u5F0F
 */
public class TestLambda {
    //3\u3001\u9759\u6001\u5185\u90E8\u7C7B
    static class Like2 implements ILike{
        @Override
        public void lambda() {
            System.out.println("I like lambda2");
        }
    }


    public static void main(String[] args) {
        ILike like = new Like();
        like.lambda();

        like = new Like2();
        like.lambda();

        //4\u3001\u5C40\u90E8\u5185\u90E8\u7C7B
        class Like3 implements ILike{
            @Override
            public void lambda() {
                System.out.println("I like lambda3");
            }
        }

        like = new Like3();
        like.lambda();


        //5\u3001\u533F\u540D\u5185\u90E8\u7C7B \u6CA1\u6709\u7C7B\u7684\u540D\u79F0\uFF0C\u5FC5\u987B\u501F\u52A9\u63A5\u53E3\u6216\u8005\u7236\u7C7B
        like = new ILike() {
            @Override
            public void lambda() {
                System.out.println("I like lambda4");
            }
        };
        like.lambda();


        //6\u3001\u7528lambda\u7B80\u5316
        like = () ->{
            System.out.println("I like lambda5");
        };
        like.lambda();

    }
}


//1\u3001\u5B9A\u4E49\u4E00\u4E2A\u51FD\u6570\u5F0F\u63A5\u53E3
interface ILike{
    void lambda();
}

//2\u3001\u5B9E\u73B0\u7C7B
class Like implements ILike{
    @Override
    public void lambda() {
        System.out.println("I like lambda");
    }
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`/*
\u603B\u7ED3\uFF1A
    1\u3001lambda\u8868\u8FBE\u5F0F\u53EA\u80FD\u6709\u4E00\u884C\u4EE3\u7801\u7684\u60C5\u51B5\u4E0B\u624D\u80FD\u7B80\u5316\u6210\u4E00\u884C
    2\u3001\u5982\u679C\u6709\u591A\u597D\u5C31\u7528\u4EE3\u7801\u5757{\u82B1\u62EC\u53F7}
    3\u3001\u524D\u63D0\u662F\u51FD\u6570\u5F0F\u63A5\u53E3
    4\u3001\u591A\u4E2A\u53C2\u6570\u4E5F\u53EF\u4EE5\u53BB\u6389\u53C2\u6570\u7C7B\u578B\uFF0C\u8981\u53BB\u6389\u5C31\u90FD\u53BB\u6389\uFF0C\u5FC5\u987B\u52A0\u62EC\u53F7
 */
public class TestLambda2 {
    public static void main(String[] args) {

        //1\u3001lambda\u8868\u8FBE\u5F0F\u7B80\u5316
        ILove love =  (int a)->{
            System.out.println("I Love you --> "+a);
        };

        //\u7B80\u53161\uFF1A\u53C2\u6570\u7C7B\u578B
        love = (a) ->{
            System.out.println("I Love you --> "+a);
        };
        //\u7B80\u53162\uFF1A\u62EC\u53F7
        love = a -> {
            System.out.println("I Love you --> "+a);
        };
        //\u7B80\u53163\uFF1A\u82B1\u62EC\u53F7
        love = a -> System.out.println("I Love2 you --> "+a);

        love.love(520);

    }
}
interface ILove{
    void love(int a);
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`//\u6587\u4EF6\u540D
String name = f1.getName();
//\u7EDD\u5BF9\u8DEF\u5F84\u5B57\u7B26\u4E32
String absolutePath = f1.getAbsolutePath();
//\u7EDD\u5BF9\u8DEF\u5F84
File absoluteFile = f1.getAbsoluteFile();
//\u83B7\u53D6\u6587\u4EF6\u5927\u5C0F
long length = f1.length();
//\u7236\u6587\u4EF6\u8DEF\u5F84
File parentFile = f1.getParentFile();
//\u7236\u6587\u4EF6\u8DEF\u5F84\u5B57\u7B26\u4E32
String parent = f1.getParent();
//\u83B7\u53D6\u6587\u4EF6\u5939\u5927\u5C0F
long totalSpace = f1.getTotalSpace();
//\u6587\u4EF6\u6700\u540E\u4FEE\u6539\u65F6\u95F4
long time = f.lastModified();
Date d = new Date(time);
System.out.println("\u83B7\u53D6\u6587\u4EF6\u7684\u6700\u540E\u4FEE\u6539\u65F6\u95F4\uFF1A"+d);
//\u8BBE\u7F6E\u6587\u4EF6\u4FEE\u6539\u65F6\u95F4\u4E3A1970.1.1 08:00:00
f.setLastModified(0);
//\u6587\u4EF6\u91CD\u547D\u540D	renameTo\u65B9\u6CD5\u7528\u4E8E\u5BF9\u7269\u7406\u6587\u4EF6\u540D\u79F0\u8FDB\u884C\u4FEE\u6539\uFF0C\u4F46\u662F\u5E76\u4E0D\u4F1A\u4FEE\u6539File\u5BF9\u8C61\u7684name\u5C5E\u6027
f.renameTo(f2);
// \u4EE5\u5B57\u7B26\u4E32\u6570\u7EC4\u7684\u5F62\u5F0F\uFF0C\u8FD4\u56DE\u5F53\u524D\u6587\u4EF6\u5939\u4E0B\u7684\u6240\u6709\u6587\u4EF6\uFF08\u4E0D\u5305\u542B\u5B50\u6587\u4EF6\u53CA\u5B50\u6587\u4EF6\u5939\uFF09
String[] list = f.list();
for (String s : list)  System.out.println(s);
// \u4EE5\u6587\u4EF6\u6570\u7EC4\u7684\u5F62\u5F0F\uFF0C\u8FD4\u56DE\u5F53\u524D\u6587\u4EF6\u5939\u4E0B\u7684\u6240\u6709\u6587\u4EF6\uFF08\u4E0D\u5305\u542B\u5B50\u6587\u4EF6\u53CA\u5B50\u6587\u4EF6\u5939\uFF09
File[] files = f.listFiles();
for (File file : files)  System.out.println(file.getName());
// \u521B\u5EFA\u6587\u4EF6\u5939\uFF0C\u5982\u679C\u7236\u6587\u4EF6\u5939skin\u4E0D\u5B58\u5728\uFF0C\u521B\u5EFA\u5C31\u65E0\u6548
f.mkdir();
// \u521B\u5EFA\u6587\u4EF6\u5939\uFF0C\u5982\u679C\u7236\u6587\u4EF6\u5939skin\u4E0D\u5B58\u5728\uFF0C\u5C31\u4F1A\u521B\u5EFA\u7236\u6587\u4EF6\u5939
f.mkdirs();
// \u521B\u5EFA\u4E00\u4E2A\u7A7A\u6587\u4EF6,\u5982\u679C\u7236\u6587\u4EF6\u5939skin\u4E0D\u5B58\u5728\uFF0C\u5C31\u4F1A\u629B\u51FA\u5F02\u5E38
f.createNewFile();
// \u6240\u4EE5\u521B\u5EFA\u4E00\u4E2A\u7A7A\u6587\u4EF6\u4E4B\u524D\uFF0C\u901A\u5E38\u90FD\u4F1A\u521B\u5EFA\u7236\u76EE\u5F55
f.getParentFile().mkdirs();
// \u5217\u51FA\u6240\u6709\u7684\u76D8\u7B26c: d: e: \u7B49\u7B49
f.listRoots();
// \u522A\u9664\u6587\u4EF6
f.delete();
// JVM\u7ED3\u675F\u7684\u65F6\u5019\uFF0C\u522A\u9664\u6587\u4EF6\uFF0C\u5E38\u7528\u4E8E\u4E34\u65F6\u6587\u4EF6\u7684\u5220\u9664
f.deleteOnExit();

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`import java.io.FileInputStream;
import java.io.IOException;

public class A1 {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
        String filePath = "a.txt";
        FileInputStream fis = new FileInputStream(filePath);
        int a;
        String result = "";
        // \u6D41\u7ED3\u675F\u7684\u5224\u65AD\uFF1A\u65B9\u6CD5read()\u7684\u8FD4\u56DE\u503C\u4E3A-1\u65F6\uFF1BreadLine()\u7684\u8FD4\u56DE\u503C\u4E3Anull\u65F6\u3002
        while ((a = fis.read()) != -1) {
            result += a;
        }
        System.out.println(result);
        /*\u8FD4\u56DE\u503C\u662F int \u7C7B\u578B\u7684\uFF0C\u4F1A\u5C06\u53D6\u51FA\u6765\u7684\u4E00\u4E2A\u5B57\u8282\u9AD8\u4F4D\u4F1A\u8865 0 \u6210\u4E00\u4E2A int \u578B\u3002\u6240\u4EE5\u8F93\u51FA\u6765\u7684\u5E94\u8BE5\u8FD9\u4E2A\u6570\u636E\u7684 ASCII \u7801\u3002*/
    }
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`import java.io.File;
import java.io.FileInputStream;
import java.io.IOException;

public class A1 {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
        File f = new File("a.txt");
        FileInputStream fis = new FileInputStream(f);
        byte[] all = new byte[(int) f.length()];
        fis.read(all);

        //\u6587\u4EF6\u4E2D\u8BFB\u51FA\u6765\u7684\u6570\u636E\u662F
        System.out.println("\u6587\u4EF6\u4E2D\u8BFB\u51FA\u6765\u7684\u6570\u636E\u662F\uFF1A");
        for (byte b : all)
        {
            int i = b&0x000000ff;  //\u53EA\u53D616\u8FDB\u5236\u7684\u540E\u4E24\u4F4D
            System.out.println(Integer.toHexString(i));
        }
        System.out.println("\u628A\u8FD9\u4E2A\u6570\u5B57\uFF0C\u653E\u5728UTF-8\u7684\u68CB\u76D8\u4E0A\u53BB\uFF1A");
        String str = new String(all,"UTF-8");
        System.out.println(str);

    }
}

import java.io.FileWriter;
import java.io.IOException;

public class A1 {

        String filePath = "a.txt";
        File file= new File(filePath);
        FileWriter fw = new FileWriter(file);
        String data = "abcdefg1234567890";
        char a[] = data.toCharArray();
        fw.write(a);
        fw.flush();//\u5FC5\u987B\u6E05\u7A7A\u7F13\u5B58\u6D41
    }
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`import java.io.*;
import java.nio.charset.Charset;

public class A1 {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
        File f = new File("a.txt");
        System.out.println("\u9ED8\u8BA4\u7F16\u7801\u65B9\u5F0F:"+ Charset.defaultCharset());

        //FileReader\u662F\u4E0D\u80FD\u624B\u52A8\u8BBE\u7F6E\u7F16\u7801\u65B9\u5F0F\u7684\uFF0C\u4E3A\u4E86\u4F7F\u7528\u5176\u4ED6\u7684\u7F16\u7801\u65B9\u5F0F\uFF0C\u53EA\u80FD\u4F7F\u7528InputStreamReader\u6765\u4EE3\u66FF
        //\u5E76\u4E14\u4F7F\u7528new InputStreamReader(new FileInputStream(f),Charset.forName("UTF-8")); \u8FD9\u6837\u7684\u5F62\u5F0F
        InputStreamReader isr = new InputStreamReader(new FileInputStream(f),Charset.forName("UTF-8"));
        char[] cs = new char[(int) f.length()];
        isr.read(cs);
        System.out.printf("InputStreamReader \u6307\u5B9A\u7F16\u7801\u65B9\u5F0FUTF-8,\u8BC6\u522B\u51FA\u6765\u7684\u5B57\u7B26\u662F\uFF1A%n");
        System.out.println(new String(cs));

    }
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`import java.io.*;public class A1 {    
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {       
        String oldFile = "1.JPEG";        
        String newFile = "2.JPG";        
        InputStream inputStream = new FileInputStream( oldFile ) ;        
        BufferedInputStream bufferedInputStream = new BufferedInputStream( inputStream ) ;       
        OutputStream outputStream = new FileOutputStream( newFile ) ;        
        BufferedOutputStream bufferedOutputStream = new BufferedOutputStream( outputStream ) ;        
        byte[] b=new byte[1024];   //\u4EE3\u8868\u4E00\u6B21\u6700\u591A\u8BFB\u53D61KB\u7684\u5185\u5BB9        
        int length = 0 ; //\u4EE3\u8868\u5B9E\u9645\u8BFB\u53D6\u7684\u5B57\u8282\u6570        
        while( (length = bufferedInputStream.read( b ) )!= -1 ){            
            //length \u4EE3\u8868\u5B9E\u9645\u8BFB\u53D6\u7684\u5B57\u8282\u6570            
            bufferedOutputStream.write(b, 0, length );        
        }        
        //\u7F13\u51B2\u533A\u7684\u5185\u5BB9\u5199\u5165\u5230\u6587\u4EF6        
        bufferedOutputStream.flush();    
    }
}

    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {        
        BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));

            bw.flush();        
        }        
        bw.close();    
    }
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`import java.io.*;public class A1 {    
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException {        
        File f =new File("a.txt");        
        //\u521B\u5EFA\u5BF9\u8C61\u8F93\u51FA\u6D41        
        FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream(f);        
        ObjectOutputStream oos =new ObjectOutputStream(fos);        
        //\u521B\u5EFA\u5BF9\u8C61\u8F93\u5165\u6D41        
        FileInputStream fis = new FileInputStream(f);        
        ObjectInputStream ois =new ObjectInputStream(fis);        
        //\u521B\u5EFA\u4E00\u4E2AHero garen        
        //\u8981\u628AHero\u5BF9\u8C61\u76F4\u63A5\u4FDD\u5B58\u5728\u6587\u4EF6\u4E0A\uFF0C\u52A1\u5FC5\u8BA9Hero\u7C7B\u5B9E\u73B0Serializable\u63A5\u53E3        
        Hero h = new Hero();        
        h.name = "garen";        
        h.hp = 616;        
        oos.writeObject(h);        
        Hero h2 = (Hero) ois.readObject();        
        System.out.println(h2.name);        
        System.out.println(h2.hp);    
    }
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`public class RunnableThread implements Runnable {
    @Override

}

new Thread(new RunnableThread()).start();

\xA0\xA0\xA0\xA0}

\xA0\xA0\xA0\xA0\xA0\xA0\xA0\xA0Thread\xA0t\xA0=\xA0new\xA0Thread(group,\xA0r,namePrefix\xA0+\xA0threadNumber.getAndIncrement(),0);

    3\u3001\u4E0D\u8981\u4F7F\u7528stop\u6216destroy\u7B49\u8FC7\u65F6\u6216JDK\u4E0D\u5EFA\u8BAE\u4F7F\u7528\u7684\u65B9\u6CD5
 */
public class testStop implements  Runnable{
    //1\u3001\u8BBE\u7F6E\u4E00\u4E2A\u6807\u5FD7\u4F4D
    private boolean flag = true;

    @Override
    public void run() {
        int i = 0;
        while (flag){
            System.out.println("run....Thread " + i++ );
        }
    }

    //2\u3001\u8BBE\u7F6E\u4E00\u4E2A\u516C\u5F00\u7684\u65B9\u6CD5\u505C\u6B62\u7EBF\u7A0B\uFF0C\u8F6C\u6362\u6807\u5FD7\u4F4D
    public void stop(){
        this.flag = false;
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        testStop testStop = new testStop();
        new Thread(testStop).start();

        for (int i = 0; i < 1000; i++){
            System.out.println("main" + i);
            if(i == 900){
                //\u8C03\u7528stop\u65B9\u6CD5\u5207\u6362\u6807\u5FD7\u4F4D\uFF0C\u8BA9\u7EBF\u7A0B\u505C\u6B62
                testStop.stop();
                System.out.println("\u7EBF\u7A0B\u505C\u6B62\u4E86");
            }
        }
    }
}

    lock.lock();//\u52A0\u9501

}
finally{
    lock.unlock();//\u89E3\u9501
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`//\u751F\u4EA7\u8005\uFF0C\u6D88\u8D39\u8005\uFF0C\u4EA7\u54C1\uFF0C\u7F13\u51B2\u533A
public class TestPC {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        SynContainer container = new SynContainer();
        new Productor(container).start();
        new Consumer(container).start();

    }
}

//\u751F\u4EA7\u8005
class Productor extends Thread{
    SynContainer container;

    public Productor(SynContainer container){
        this.container = container;
    }
    //\u751F\u4EA7

    @Override
    public void run() {
        for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++) {
            System.out.println("\u751F\u4EA7\u4E86"+i+"\u53EA\u9E21");
            container.push(new Chicken(i));
        }
    }
}

//\u6D88\u8D39\u8005
class Consumer extends Thread{
    SynContainer container;

    public Consumer(SynContainer container){
        this.container = container;
    }

    @Override
    public void run() {
        for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++) {
            System.out.println("\u6D88\u8D39\u4E86-->"+container.pop().id+"\u53EA\u9E21");
        }
    }
}

//\u4EA7\u54C1
class Chicken{
    int id;
    public Chicken(int id){
        this.id = id;
    }

}

//h\u7F13\u51B2\u533A
class  SynContainer{
    //\u9700\u8981\u4E00\u4E2A\u5BB9\u5668\u5927\u5C0F
    Chicken[] chickens = new Chicken[10];
    //\u5BB9\u5668\u8BA1\u6570\u5668
    int count = 0;

    //\u751F\u4EA7\u8005\u653E\u5165\u4EA7\u54C1
    public synchronized void push(Chicken chicken){
        //\u5982\u679C\u5BB9\u5668\u6EE1\u4E86\uFF0C\u5C31\u9700\u8981\u7B49\u5F85\u6D88\u8D39\u8005\u6D88\u8D39
        if (count == chickens.length){
            //\u901A\u77E5\u6D88\u8D39\u8005\u6D88\u8D39\uFF0C\u751F\u4EA7\u7B49\u5F85
            try {
                this.wait();
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }

        //\u5982\u679C\u6CA1\u6709\u6EE1\uFF0C\u5C31\u4E22\u5165\u4EA7\u54C1
        chickens[count] = chicken;
        count++;

        //\u53EF\u4EE5\u901A\u77E5\u6D88\u8D39\u8005\u6D88\u8D39\u4E86
        this.notifyAll();
    }

    //\u6D88\u8D39\u8005\u6D88\u8D39\u4EA7\u54C1
    public synchronized  Chicken pop(){
        if(count == 0){
            //\u7B49\u5F85\u751F\u4EA7\u8005\u751F\u4EA7\uFF0C\u6D88\u8D39\u8005\u7B49\u5F85
            try {
                this.wait();
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }

        //\u5982\u679C\u53EF\u4EE5\u6D88\u8D39
        count--;
        Chicken chicken = chickens[count];

        //\u5403\u5B8C\u4E86\uFF0C\u901A\u77E5\u751F\u4EA7\u8005\u751F\u4EA7
        this.notifyAll();
        return chicken;
    }

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
import java.util.concurrent.Executors;
public class TestPool {    
    public static void main(String[] args) {        
        //1\u3001\u521B\u5EFA\u670D\u52A1\uFF0C\u521B\u5EFA\u7EBF\u7A0B\u6C60        
        ExecutorService service = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(10);//\u7EBF\u7A0B\u6C60\u5927\u5C0F        
        //\u6267\u884C        
        service.execute(new MyThread());        
        service.execute(new MyThread());        
        service.execute(new MyThread());        
        //2\u3001\u5173\u95ED\u94FE\u63A5        
        service.shutdown();    
    }
}
class MyThread implements Runnable{    
    @Override    public void run() {        
        for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++) {            
            System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName()+i);        
        }    
    }
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`package anno;
 
import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.METHOD;
import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.TYPE;
 
import java.lang.annotation.Documented;
import java.lang.annotation.Inherited;
import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
import java.lang.annotation.Target;
 
@Target({METHOD,TYPE})
@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
@Inherited
@Documented
public @interface JDBCConfig {
     String ip();
     int port() default 3306;
     String database();
     String encoding();
     String loginName();
     String password();
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`package util;
 
import anno.JDBCConfig;
 
@JDBCConfig(ip = "127.0.0.1", database = "test", encoding = "UTF-8", loginName = "root", password = "admin")
public class DBUtil {
    static {
        try {
            Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver");
        } catch (ClassNotFoundException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
 
}
